text: STAR VS. SNOWFLAKE SCHEMA Issue #1: Normalization — Snowflake schemas take up less storage space. — Denormalized data models may incur integrity and consistency violations. Issue #2: Query Complexity — Snowflake schemas require more joins to get the data needed for a query. — Queries on star schemas will (usually) be faster. . | S2CMUDB . . i: ‘ - ‘ IM » pl % 11:40/12514 e - Sl I 80 24 - Distributed OLAP Databases (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
